title: Chunky cheesecake brownies
ingredients: ['225g cream cheese, softened', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 egg', '170g chocolate chips or chopped plain chocolate', '50g butter', '170g plain chocolate, chopped', '100g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '85g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
